website_summaries.verdict: A sectional gaining popularity thanks to its thick seat and back cushions. It delivers on its promise and comes at an outstanding price.
pros: This sectional gets an all-around grade A for its 2 free throw pillows (which add to the thick, non-flattening cushions), furniture clips, and leveling feet
What’s more, the company’s customer service is excellent
cons: The backs of the pieces are a little low at just over 25" high

customer_reviews.title: So comfy! Love the pillows & the colors!
customer_reviews.text: I thought & shopped about this purchase for a few months. So glad we did it! Pillows are comfy & do not move. Love the blue pillows & the espresso colors! My teens read & relax on it in the morning & after school like it’s an extra living room. My husband put it together, simple enough, but took a few hours. All the parts were included. A package a clamps came in the following day, so we were so pumped! I’m writing this review on it, drinking my coffee, listening to the birds :) This evening maybe a glass of wine 🍷
customer_reviews.author: Shine77

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy sectional of good quality!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of searching I decided on this outdoor sectional because of the reviews, the stick cushions, and the design. I was a little worried about the low height of the back of the sofa however after using it several times I realize it’s extremely comfortable and I’m glad it has the height it does. We have had it out and some pretty substantial rain and the cushions dried quite quickly which I was happy about! The cushions have ties that I haven’t quite figured out where to tie them to yet. I’m really happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: We bought this over the summer for our new house. I really liked the bright color and how you could switch the pieces around. It wasn't easy to put together, but it wasn't hard either. It took a couple hours. We sprayed it with ScotchGuard and purchased a cover for it as well. The set is comfortable. Yes, the back is low, but nobody in my family has had a problem with that. I spent a lot of time watching the kids swim, reading a book, and talking with others. We did have a couple issues, but once the company was aware, they quickly resolved them. I find this set comfortable, sturdy, and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Jager

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, but a nice sectional.
customer_reviews.text: The set seems well-made, and we love the colors. There are some marks on top of two of the rattan middle seats, almost like it was dragged on a factory floor, or maybe they were returned. The fabric maybe be a little water resistant, but it's definitely NOT waterproof. Overall a nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for pretty good sofa
customer_reviews.text: This couch is fantastic for the price. You wont get a better Bang for your buck. It's beautiful and the colors are bright. It's extremely sturdy and high quality. The downside though, is that it's not super comfortable. And the back cushions are really low. The other negative is that after it has been used for several months, the cushion start to squish and widen. As you can see in the photo, they no longer fit on the frame. Over all though, I still give it 4 stars because you can't beat the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Good company, happy customer
customer_reviews.text: We had to change the address after we had submitted the order and the company was so kind about it and told us not to worry and that they would get our patio set to the correct address. It came to the right address in great time. Even though the set had a lot of pieces for assembly that took some time, it was pretty simple to assemble. We love that we are able to move pieces around as needed. The pop of color on our back patio is perfect. We are happily enjoying our set!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen J.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money & great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I put this outdoor sectional on our covered porch and it looks fantastic. There were some parts missing for one of the middle seats; but after contacting the seller, they immediately put the missing parts kit in the mail & I received it within 3 days. There were also a couple of holes missing, but they were easy enough to drill. The cushions are a little harder than I'd hoped, but they soften with some use, & cushions are easy to replace. For the price, I don't know if you'll find better! I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Misty E.

customer_reviews.title: Great set and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Researched for a month and choose this set beacause of the customer service reviews and cushion thickness.Absolutely love this set! My husband and I were 2 weeks out from me donating him my kidney and we put it together in 3 hrs, Imagine if we felt good! My husband is not happy with the teal color but customer service has been amazing so far, We are going to swap for the beige, I like the teal but he says no. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sectional.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. It's not difficult to assemble once you get going. Seating area is huge. Very sturdy. Cushions are nice and thick. Assembly tip: open the thin box first (table), as it has the tools to put everything together. I opened it last :).
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: It is gorgeous and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sisters birthday! I live with her and she fell in love with it but couldn’t afford it. She put it together with the help of our brother! She loves spending the cooling evenings out on her porch in her new furniture! It brings me joy to know how much she enjoys it!
customer_reviews.author: SilverRayne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great looking patio set, and a fantastic value. It was very easy to put together, just allow some time, if you are doing it alone. The pieces are sturdy, comfortable, and easy to configure. The color of the cushions and the pillows are fantastic. I contacted customer service about an issue with one cushion, and they responded quickly. I’m crazy happy with this patio set. Perfect for weekend naps. I feel like I’m at a resort!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great sectional for price
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Took a while to assemble. Back is a bit low... wish it was higher for comfort. Cushions slide a bit. Need to add Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Unger

customer_reviews.title: Love this set and this company!
customer_reviews.text: Great furniture! Very durable cushions. Customer service is phenomenal! Received very quickly. One piece had holes drilled in wrong place. I contacted customer service, who in turn responded quickly and sent a replacement part in a very timely manner. Would highly recommend this set and this company is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer :)
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a patio furniture set, this is the one! We love it! We received 4 boxes 3 days after ordering them, we were missing one corner piece. I messaged seller and they replied within 30 minutes and told me the corner piece was in transit. They gave me a tracking number and sure enough, it came in 2 days later. 5 stars for sure! I would definitely recommend and without a doubt buy them again! Btw: the middle table is the corner :)
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like sitting on bricks. Took my husband 6 hours to put together. Extremely uncomfortable. I would return it but it’s put together. Only plus is it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great Patio Set for the Money
customer_reviews.text: For the price range, this patio set is great. The turquoise color is very pretty, but slightly lighter than the picture shown on Amazon. Unless you regularly assemble things, the first piece goes together a little slow, but you cruise after that because it's very logical. For the couch part, I would recommend buying medium size patio furniture clips to hold it together. I would have given comfort 5 stars except that the backs are a little low (still great for the money). I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick the Donkey

customer_reviews.title: Good value....
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat labor intensive, but it is very nice after the job is done. As stated by others the instructions need some additional details. Lastly, the ratchet tool to make installation easier was found in the glass top table box. Overall - I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but sits low and time consuming to assemble
customer_reviews.text: They do give you the tools for assembly in one of the hardware bags. Easy to assemble but very time consuming. Time for assembly is the main downside. The other downside is the furniture is a little smaller than I thought and it sits low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Good product, quick shipping, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are a little vague on how to assemble, but once we put together the first, the rest went pretty smoothly. The carrier didn't deliver all the boxes at one time, so when we contacted the company, they were quick to research and find out where the missing box was. The price was very competitive compared to other outdoor sets, it shipped quickly, and the set came well wrapped and had no damage or mis-assembled pieces at all. We also ordered a cover to help protect it.
customer_reviews.author: George T Curry

customer_reviews.title: Not hard to put together, however it's nice to have a second set of hands.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, but in this case you get a great set for an even greater price!! So versatile, many configurations, add more little pillows and put the side pillows behind your head for extra support. See pics. We made a conversation couch and two separate seats. Again lots of options. Really happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Smith

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around for patio furniture for 2 weeks. I am SO glad I chose this one!!! The cushions are EXTREMELY comfortable and the furniture was easy to assemble. I didn't receive my table with the shipment, but I contacted the seller and they were extremely courteous. I received my table today. I absolutely love this furniture!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Saffold

customer_reviews.title: Not hard to set up and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The set took about 4 hours to set up by myself. It looks great. I was proactive and scotch guarded it and put a cover on it, even though my porch is covered. I've have it for 3 months and it has brought much joy to my family.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Horak

customer_reviews.title: High quality with outstanding services
customer_reviews.text: High quality with good depths and heights for comfort sitting. The cushions are much thicker than most patio sofa I have seen. The color is beautiful to light up the whole backyard. Services is outstanding with prompt reply for any question.
customer_reviews.author: minimin

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, easy to put together. I was afraid that the back was not high enough but its perfect. Very comfortable to sit on, pillows are thick and great quality. Very happy with customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: So far we love it! Love the fact we can make the layout a bunch of different ways.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ray

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Great patio set. Took some time initially to build, but once you get the hang of it, it's pretty easy. Connectors don't look like they will fit, but they do... just need to twist. Received one incorrect component and customer service was quick to rectify at no additional cost. That component is already on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and sturdy set. The clips hold the arrangement (of choice) together so the pieces don’t slide around as you sit down. Beautiful set, we are getting a ton of compliments on the fun color! Perfect addition to our deck for the spring and summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Return headache!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the items but if you don’t like what you ordered it’s almost impossible to return it. I have been in contact with the seller for over a week and nothing yet. Unprofessional and a very long process for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Love the sofa!
customer_reviews.text: We love love love the sofa. It looks great and is super comfortable. The cushions are amazing and the wicker looks nice. Great quality product and easy to assemble. Couldn’t be more happier.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great value for the price. The size was a little shorter that I had originally expected, but it fits our space very well. There was one small issue with a part and the customer service getting it resolved was also great!
customer_reviews.author: Georgi McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Good prodcut. Assembly tools are in the coffee table box.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the patio furniture, it was easy to assemble and came in quick. Great quality for the asking price.
customer_reviews.author: Valdemar Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: Chair cushions are too hard and not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for pool house. Looks great, but the chair cushions are very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: horse

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Its an excellent sturdy piece. Attractive to the eyes, easy to assemble and very good seller's service too. The cushions are nice and fluffy. The sofas are sturdy. I will post pics once all are set up
customer_reviews.author: Fnu Tasneem

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as appears in photo. Clips to hold the pieces together we’re not sent originally. But mailed immediately when I made them aware. Very nice set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug C

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I shopped beige cushion for myself and my grandma saw it and love it, so I ordered this turquoise one for her. She is so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I just got these today and they look great. Shipping was very fast. Looking forward to using for many years!
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK S BROWNING

customer_reviews.title: Good quality outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.text: Very strong. Bolts together nicely. Stainless hardware for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: GREAAAAAAT
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and looks great in my pool area.
customer_reviews.author: Marishella Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, packed well, ship super fast
customer_reviews.text: My furniture arrived yesterday put it together last night it's absolutely gorgeous so beautiful. Very easy instructions Packed very well ship super fast. If you're looking for outside furniture this is the best I bought the blue set.love it love it
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Nabors

product_meta.title: Do4U Patio Sofa 7-Piece Set Outdoor Furniture Sectional All-Weather Wicker Rattan Sofa Turquoise Seat & Back Cushions, Garden Lawn Pool Backyard Outdoor Sofa Wicker Conversation Set (Turquoise)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars76 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
